description:
In this episode, the guys, alongside guest motivational speaker Inky Johnson, discuss how to change the preset narratives about race & money by operating in facts versus feelings. When it comes to past events, it's essential to have accurate information that promotes a genuine reaction rather than reacting the way someone thinks you should. We should always seek to work and move on principle, never emotion. We should value facts over feelings, always. 
 Listener Perks
  Get fresh pre-measured ingredients delivered to your door with Hello Fresh. Go to www.Hellofresh.com/10success and use the Promo Code “10SUCCESS” to get 10 FREE Meals and FREE shipping.

 Organifi is giving our listeners up to 20% off of their order! Just go to www.organifi.com/success. Their superfood green juice powder allows you to get your greens anytime, anywhere while on the go.
  Get connected with a network of over 3,500 people who listen to ET, and embody the work ethic and spirit of ET. To learn more about Breathe University. Subscribe to the podcast via  Apple Podcasts.
